DESCRIPTION: Select a custom background picture for your profile.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}background set [Background ID] [black or white]** ~ Sets a background and theme.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}background view [Background ID] [black or white]** ~ View how a background and theme will look before setting it.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: » To request a custom background, you must be a Nitro Booster of the Gamer support server. Use the invite command to join the server for more details.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: » To see all the available backgrounds please check out our wiki page. Background ID´s from 1 to 17.
SELECTION_TITLE: Type the number for your custom background selection.
SELECTION_FOOTER: Please select a background by number or cancel with [q]uit.
INVALID: There is no background with the ID {{id}}!
PREVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Do you really want to select that background? Please use one of the reactions to take action:
SAVED: You have successfully changed your background. Loading your profile now...
VIP_THEME: ⭐ Sorry, but the dark theme is only for VIP users. If you want to become VIP, join the gamer server with the invite command and boost the gamer server.
UNLOCKABLE: Background #{{id}} is not unlockable with currency.
NEED_MONEY: You do not have enough Gamer Coins to buy this background. This background costs {{cost}} and you only have {{currency}}. You need {{needed}} more Gamer Coins.
BOUGHT: You just bought the #{{name}} background pack. You can now use the background command to equip your backgrounds.
